definition[0]: a testing situation, experience etc is difficult to deal with
definition[1]: the process of checking something to see if it works, if it is suitable etc
example[1]: The company specializes in software testing and software inspection.
example[2]: All our desktop computers undergo rigorous testing.
example[3]: Many people are against testing on animals.
example[4]: Phase one of the testing, which involves human testing of the drug, will be underway by the end of next year.
definition[2]: the process of asking someone questions, usually in written form, in order to find out their level of ability, if they are suitable for a job etc
example[5]: Some companies carry out on-line testing of candidates before they come in for interview.
